version_description:
New landscape mode, coach, online play, ELO Appraisal, 100 graded levels, World rankings, over 5000 board / set skin combinations, improved engine, universal app, all new HD artwork, and more!
Voted No1 best Chess app!

Less advertising, better memory use, improved performance, bug fixes, new name, new "1982" chess skin.
New Coach, online play, 100 graded levels, new sets, new boards, improved engine, universal app, retina artwork for iPhone and more! Voted No1 best Chess app!

Much smaller program size.
The free version of chess is now standard resolution to make way for forthcoming features.
Other tweaks and enhancements.

iPhoneX support and now with 7 Modes of Play!
New Grandmaster Mode, Several Databases with Powerful Search and Famous Games, Annotated Games, New Analysis, New Infinite Chess Puzzles, New Timed Mode, New Blitz Mode, New Coach, Online Play via Game Center, 100 Graded Levels, 5000+ Skin Combinations, Opening Discovery in Training Mode, Improved Chess Engine and more!

Updated to support the latest version of 'IOS'. New privacy settings. Now with minimal advertising!
Various improvements. Fixed the digital clocks. Fixed the moves list bug.
Fixed several issues. Significant chess engine improvements (harder).
Bug fix. Updated with latest SDKs. No known issues. Six different ways to play chess.
Fixed the rating bug. Updated with latest SDKs. No known issues. Six different ways to play chess.
Gameplay improvements. Updated for the latest SDK. Fixed an issue.
All known issues fixed. Improved chess gameplay. New privacy settings.
Improved chess gameplay. New privacy settings. Updated for latest SDK.
All known issues fixed. Improved gameplay.
New Version 4. A huge update to your favourite chess game! New landscape mode. New skin presets. New backgrounds. Major overhaul. Now backwards compatible with IOS12 too. Super powerful Multihint.

New Version 4. A huge update to your favourite chess game! New landscape mode. New skin presets. New backgrounds. Major overhaul. Now backwards compatible with IOS12 too. Super powerful Multihint. V4.02 fixes a few last minute bugs that we were made aware of.
